channel.title: app transfer on Andy Ibanez
channel.description: Recent content in app transfer on Andy Ibanez

item.title: What I Learned From Selling an App
item.description: What I Learned From Selling an App A few weeks ago, I sold and transferred my app, Next Anime Episode, to another developer. In this article, I will discuss the reasons I transferred my app, and what I learned along the way in the process of transferring it. Why I Sold My App As a developer who works a full time job and work on indie apps as a hobby, there are many ideas I want to work on.
